title: Studio Display firmware references unreleased Mac Mini model
content:
We’ve been hearing about a refreshed Mac Mini model for several months now. Since the reveal of the M1 chip (and its family), Apple has only introduced one Mac Mini model. It’s powered by its own Silicon and features the same design of the recently-released models. We’ve noticed a pattern that the Cupertino tech giant

The post Studio Display firmware references unreleased Mac Mini model appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Apple's Studio Display references an unreleased Mac Mini model that the Cupertino tech giant could be introducing in the near future.
